description: Support to Decentralization and Community Development in Byumba Province

subproject.corporate outcome: National, regional and local levels of governance expand their capacities to manage the equitable delivery of public services
subproject.description: Strengthened capacities of local authorities in Gicumbi and Rulindo in the areas of development planning, financial management, tender, monitoring, good-governance, gender and pro-poor sensitivity.
subproject.title: Support Decentralization Commu

title: Support Decentralization Community Development Byumba
